attributes.action: Begin impeachment proceedings against ex Prime Minister Blair.
attributes.additional_details: The Chilcot Inquiry and subsequent report has revealed in stark detail the extent of Blair's duplicity and deception.
attributes.background: Tony Blair as the then Prime Minister of the UK intentionally lied and misled Parliament as to the threat posed by Saddam Hussein's Iraqi regime.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept a petition calling for impeachment because this procedure is now considered obsolete. It is not therefore clear what action could be taken on this petition. 
 
This note explains the history of impeachment and the current position: 

http://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/CBP-7612
